SEARCH
Package keyInputs

Class KeyHandler

java.lang.Object
keyInputs.KeyHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyHandler extends Object implements KeyListener
The KeyHandler class implements the KeyListener interface and handles keyboard input for the game. It updates the game state and player actions based on key events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a KeyHandler with a reference to the GamePanel.

    • setLeftPlayerUpPressed

      public void setLeftPlayerUpPressed(boolean leftPlayerUpPressed)
      Sets the state of the left player's up movement. This method is intended to be used only in unit tests.
